abstract: If it ever became necessary to unwind Bank of America, federal authorities would be dealing with an institution more than three times bigger than Lehman Brothers.
snippet: If it ever became necessary to unwind Bank of America, federal authorities would be dealing with an institution more than three times bigger than Lehman Brothers.
lead_paragraph: Public Citizen, a consumer advocacy group, is calling for the breakup of Bank of America.

headline.main: Activists Call for Breakup of Bank of America

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
